title: Godlovesyou
author: Godlovesyou
content: Bitcoin Puzzle BoxIn 2019 there was a Kickstarter project launched to design a Bitcoin puzzle box for playing cards. It's not really a Bitcoin puzzle, but an artistic rendition of something resembling one.The Bitcoin playing card puzzle box was presented by the author himself (Andrei Jikh) on Reddit and elsewhere. Again, this isn't really a Bitcoin puzzle in the cryptographic senseLinks to access bitcoin puzzlesClassic Bitcointalk Thread on Bitcoin PuzzlesCrack This Crypto Puzzle to Win 2.1 BTC/r/bitcoinpuzzles - Bitcoin Puzzles on RedditDesigning Proof of Transaction Puzzles for CryptocurrenciesBitCrack Tool to Brute Force Private KeysSample Bitcoin Puzzle TXA well known Bitcoin Puzzle TXThere’s $70,000 worth of Bitcoin hidden inside this image310 Bitcoin Challenge Solutions [Bitcoin Puzzle]Introducing the 310 BTC Bitcoin ChallengeBitcoin 310 Challenge [Bitcoin Puzzle]Armchair Detectives Have Another Bitcoin Puzzle to SolveOver $1 million in bitcoin was hidden in a picture – and there’s still some left to be found.Bitcoin Puzzle's $1.9M Prize Purportedly Won in a WeekAlternative Cryptocurrency Mining PuzzlesBitcoin Puzzle Games Are Growing in Popularityhttps://crypto.bi/bitcoin-puzzle/More findings related here.
